commit.message:
unwind-dw2-fde-darwin.c (DESTRUCTOR_MAY_BE_CALLED_LIVE): New.

	* unwind-dw2-fde-darwin.c (DESTRUCTOR_MAY_BE_CALLED_LIVE): New.
	(live_image_destructor): Reset image to initial state.
	(examine_objects): Set DESTRUCTOR_MAY_BE_CALLED_LIVE.

From-SVN: r65145
